title: Jon Gruden, Dak Prescott, Russell Wilson, and Aaron Rodgers
itunes:title: Jon Gruden, Dak Prescott, Russell Wilson, and Aaron Rodgers
description:
Colin discusses why Oakland Raiders HC Jon Gruden isn't a QB guru, what concerns him about Dallas Cowboys QB Dak Prescott, why he feels Seattle Seahawks QB Russell Wilson doesn't get the respect he deserves, and why he feels Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers is injury prone. Guests include Greg Cosell, Doug Gottlieb, Mark Schlereth, and Bucky Brooks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
